member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType
member.summary: Message type prefix for game transport messages (server/client). The byte sits after the protocol version in the envelope.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown or uninitialized message.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType.ArenaStateSnapshot
member.summary: Full state snapshot.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType.ArenaStateDelta
member.summary: State delta update.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType.CombatEvent
member.summary: Combat event batch.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType.MatchState
member.summary: Match-level state update.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType.OpportunityData
member.summary: Opportunity/QTE data for clients.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType.CinematicExtension
member.summary: Cinematic extension payload reference.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType.ConnectRequest
member.summary: Client requests to join/connect.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType.PlayerInput
member.summary: Player input from client.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType.OpportunityResponse
member.summary: Response to an opportunity/QTE.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType.Ping
member.summary: Latency/keepalive ping.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameProtocolEnvelope
member.summary: Helper for serializing/deserializing game transport messages with a 2-byte envelope: [0] = protocol version, [1] = GameMessageType, [2..] = MessagePack-serialized payload (LZ4).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameProtocolEnvelope.CurrentVersion
member.summary: Current protocol version for envelopes.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameProtocolEnvelope.DefaultOptions
member.summary: Default MessagePack options (LZ4 compression).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameProtocolEnvelope.Serialize``1(BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameMessageType,``0,System.Byte,MessagePack.MessagePackSerializerOptions)
member.summary: Serialize a message with an envelope (version + message type).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameProtocolEnvelope.Parse(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Parse an envelope and return version, type, and payload slice.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameProtocolEnvelope.DeserializePayload``1(System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte},MessagePack.MessagePackSerializerOptions)
member.summary: Deserialize a payload after parsing the envelope.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.GameProtocolEnvelope.ParseAndDeserialize``1(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},MessagePack.MessagePackSerializerOptions)
member.summary: Convenience: parse envelope and deserialize payload to a type.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ArenaStateDelta
member.summary: State delta (server -> client) using per-entity bitmask for changed fields.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ArenaStateDelta.Tick
member.summary: Server tick when this delta was created.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ArenaStateDelta.Entities
member.summary: Entities with changed state since last snapshot/delta.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDelta
member.summary: Per-entity delta with bitmask indicating which fields changed.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDelta.EntityId
member.summary: Unique identifier of the entity.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDelta.Flags
member.summary: Bitmask of changed fields (flags below).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDelta.X
member.summary: X position (only valid if Position flag set).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDelta.Y
member.summary: Y position (only valid if Position flag set).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDelta.Z
member.summary: Z position (only valid if Position flag set).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDelta.RotationY
member.summary: Y-axis rotation in radians (only valid if Rotation flag set).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDelta.Health
member.summary: Current health value (only valid if Health flag set).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDelta.ActionState
member.summary: Current action state identifier (only valid if ActionState flag set).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDeltaFlags
member.summary: Bitmask flags indicating which fields in an have changed.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDeltaFlags.None
member.summary: No fields changed.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDeltaFlags.Position
member.summary: Position (X, Y, Z) changed.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDeltaFlags.Rotation
member.summary: Rotation changed.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDeltaFlags.Health
member.summary: Health changed.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityDeltaFlags.ActionState
member.summary: Action state changed.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ArenaStateSnapshot
member.summary: Full state snapshot (server -> client).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ArenaStateSnapshot.Tick
member.summary: Server tick when this snapshot was created.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ArenaStateSnapshot.Entities
member.summary: All entity states at this tick.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ArenaStateSnapshot.Phase
member.summary: Current combat phase (0=Waiting, 1=Countdown, 2=Fighting, 3=Opportunity, 4=Cinematic, 5=Finished).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ArenaStateSnapshot.CinematicId
member.summary: Cinematic ID when in cinematic phase (null otherwise).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ArenaStateSnapshot.CinematicAttacker
member.summary: Cinematic attacker entity slot (0=MonsterA, 1=MonsterB).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ArenaStateSnapshot.CinematicDefender
member.summary: Cinematic defender entity slot (0=MonsterA, 1=MonsterB).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ArenaStateSnapshot.CinematicTargetId
member.summary: Cinematic target object ID (e.g., boulder ID).

member.summary: Basic entity state for snapshots.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityState.EntityId
member.summary: Unique identifier of the entity.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityState.X
member.summary: X position in world space.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityState.Y
member.summary: Y position in world space.

member.summary: Z position in world space.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityState.RotationY
member.summary: Y-axis rotation in radians.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityState.Health
member.summary: Current health value.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.EntityState.ActionState
member.summary: Current action state identifier.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CinematicExtensionMessage
member.summary: Cinematic extension offer (server -> client) carrying attach point metadata and payload reference.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CinematicExtensionMessage.ExchangeId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this exchange/transaction.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CinematicExtensionMessage.AttachPoint
member.summary: Behavior tree attach point where this extension should be applied.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CinematicExtensionMessage.PayloadType
member.summary: Type of payload (default: "abml-bytecode").

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CinematicExtensionMessage.PayloadUrl
member.summary: URL where the payload can be fetched.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CinematicExtensionMessage.Hint
member.summary: Optional hint for the client about the extension content.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CinematicExtensionMessage.InitiateState
member.summary: Optional key-value state bag to seed the next behavior when applied.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CinematicExtensionMessage.ValidUntilEpochMs
member.summary: Unix epoch milliseconds when this extension expires.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEventMessage
member.summary: Combat events batched per tick (server -> client).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEventMessage.Tick
member.summary: Server tick when these events occurred.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEventMessage.Events
member.summary: Combat events that occurred this tick.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEvent
member.summary: Individual combat event within a batch.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEvent.Type
member.summary: Type of combat event.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEvent.SourceEntityId
member.summary: Entity that initiated the combat action.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEvent.TargetEntityId
member.summary: Entity that received the combat action.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEvent.Amount
member.summary: Amount of damage, healing, or effect value.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEvent.RemainingHp
member.summary: Target's remaining HP after this event.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEvent.DurationMs
member.summary: Duration of effect in milliseconds (for staggers, etc.).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEventType
member.summary: Types of combat events that can occur.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEventType.Hit
member.summary: Damage dealt to target.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEventType.Stagger
member.summary: Target staggered/interrupted.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEventType.Heal
member.summary: Health restored to target.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.CombatEventType.Block
member.summary: Attack blocked by target.

member.summary: Unique identifier of the connecting player.

member.summary: Session identifier from the authentication system.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.ConnectRequestMessage.MatchId

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.OpportunityDataMessage
member.summary: Opportunity/QTE prompt (server -> client).

member.summary: Unique identifier for this opportunity.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.OpportunityDataMessage.Prompt
member.summary: Text prompt displayed to the player.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.OpportunityDataMessage.Options
member.summary: Available options the player can select.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.OpportunityDataMessage.DefaultOptionId
member.summary: Option to select if player doesn't respond in time.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.OpportunityDataMessage.DeadlineMs
member.summary: Time limit in milliseconds before default is selected.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.OpportunityDataMessage.ExchangeId
member.summary: Optional exchange identifier for correlated transactions.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.OpportunityDataMessage.Forced
member.summary: Whether this opportunity requires immediate response (blocks gameplay).

member.summary: A selectable option within an opportunity/QTE prompt.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.OpportunityOption.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for this option (sent back in response).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.OpportunityOption.Label
member.summary: Display label shown to the player.

member.summary: Identifier of the opportunity being responded to.

member.summary: Identifier of the option the player selected.

member.summary: Optional exchange identifier for correlated transactions.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Protocol.Messages.OpportunityResponseMessage.ClientLatencyMs
member.summary: Client-measured latency in milliseconds (for timing compensation).
